repositories.name: Flowchart_Plagiarism_Detection
repositories.description: CDAC Project - A tool to check similarity between flowcharts and determine if they are plagiarised

ai_analysis.purpose: This project aims to detect plagiarism between flowcharts by analyzing their structure and content. It uses image processing, OCR, and graph comparison techniques to assess the similarity between flowcharts and determine if plagiarism has occurred.
ai_analysis.category: Tool/application with web interface using Streamlit for flowchart plagiarism detection
key_features: Image Processing using OpenCV and Pillow
Optical Character Recognition using PaddleOCR and EasyOCR
Similarity Analysis using cosine similarity and TF-IDF
ai_analysis.development_status: Development phase with active development indicated by multiple Notebooks and separate modules
use_cases: Educators: Detect plagiarism in student flowchart submissions
Researchers: Ensure originality in research papers with flowcharts
Businesses: Protect intellectual property and prevent unauthorized copying
